thread.title: Hrithik Roshan: When I wanted to feel love, I became love myself
thread.title_full: Hrithik Roshan: When I wanted to feel love, I became love myself

title: Hrithik Roshan: When I wanted to feel love, I became love myself
text: Hrithik Roshan: When I wanted to feel love, I became love myself Friday, 23 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Hrithik Roshan said: "I wouldn't advocate or tell people that you can't do it if you don't have emotional support. In fact I believe all the resources you need as a human being, you have within you."
